title: United Kingdom - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 24000 BDT + VFS Service Charge (For Standard : 3380 BDT , For PRemium :9750 BDT )

details.title: Required Documents
items: Online application form and appointment confirmation.
Valid MRP Passport. (At least six-month validity & 02 continuous blank pages).
Copy of National ID card/ smart card.
Recent Photograph 02 Copy With a white background and borderless. (35 mm x 45 mm).
Visa request letter by the applicant to the UK embassy.
Invitation letter (If Family or Business visitor).
Hotel Booking according to travel date (If needed).
Air Ticket booking according to Travel date.
Bank statements for the last six months personal and company accounts. (Savings and current account).
Nikhanama, Marriage Certificate In English/Translated. (If Needed).

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
